sources.title: Lightning Strikes West (1940) KEN MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Ken Maynard,  Charles King, George Chesebro
Directed by: Harry L. Fraser

When a notorious bank robber escapes prison, the Marshal sends for Lightning Morgan to bring him back and find his hidden gold! A cyclonic drama of Love, laughter, and slaughter in a land where blue steel glints, bullets whine, and Death rides on dangerous trails.

metadata.Plot: When Butch Taggart escapes prison, the Marshal sends Lightning Morgan to find him and his hidden gold. He finds the map to the gold on Taggart's boot. Joe Laikon and his men are also after the gold and they overpower Morgan, get the map, and head for the treasure. But Morgan and Tod Grant are soon on their trail.
metadata.Actors: Ken Maynard, Claire Rochelle, Bob Terry
